attributes.action: To send aid to the people of Yemen and raise awareness.
attributes.additional_details: Awareness. How can we as humans have a peace of mind when men, women, children and elderly are being abused and mercilessly slaughtered. How can we call ourselves humans if we sit and heartlessly watch massacre take place. Join this petition to be the voice for those who dont have a voice and to protect those worth protecting.
attributes.background: There is a war going on yet we have all turned a blind eye. The Yemeni civil war is crushing its people and causing all kinds of ill fate, from starvation, illnesses and death of innocent.This forgotten war cannot stay in the dark we must highlight it and raise
